text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a _ActInvoiceDetailCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActInvoiceDetailDrugProductCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActInvoiceDetailClinicalProductCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActInvoiceDetailPreferredAccommodationCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActInvoiceDetailGenericCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-xActInvoiceDetailPharmacyCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-xActInvoiceDetailPreferredAccommodationCode

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _ActInvoiceDetailCodeActInvoiceDetailCodeCodes representing a service or product that is being invoiced (billed). The code can represent such concepts as "office visit", "drug X", "wheelchair" and other billable items such as taxes, service charges and discounts.

name: ActInvoiceDetailCode
title: ActInvoiceDetailCode
description: Codes representing a service or product that is being invoiced (billed). The code can represent such concepts as "office visit", "drug X", "wheelchair" and other billable items such as taxes, service charges and discounts.
